item.name: Number of network interfaces
item.description: The number of network interfaces (regardless of their current state) present on this system.

discovery_rule.name: Network interfaces
discovery_rule.description:
You may also consider using IF-MIB::ifType or IF-MIB::ifAlias for discovery depending on your filtering needs.
{$SNMP_COMMUNITY} is a global macro.

item_prototype.name: Admin status of interface $1
item_prototype.description: The desired state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Description of interface $1
item_prototype.description: A textual string containing information about the interface. This string should include the name of the manufacturer, the product name and the version of the interface hardware/software.

item_prototype.name: Inbound errors on interface $1
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.

item_prototype.name: Incoming multicast packets on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of inbound multicast packets

item_prototype.name: Incoming traffic on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of octets in valid MAC frames received on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Operational status of interface $1
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Outbound errors on interface $1
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.

item_prototype.name: Outgoing multicast packets on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of outbound multicast packets

item_prototype.name: Outgoing traffic on interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of octets transmitted in MAC frames on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Interface speed of interface $1
item_prototype.description: Interface speed in bits per second.

trigger_prototype.name: Admin status was changed on {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifAdminStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}=1 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifOperStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifOperStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].diff(0)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Operational status changed to DOWN on {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifAdminStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}=1 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifOperStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}=1 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifOperStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].diff(0)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Operational status changed to UP on {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:snmptrap["(IF-MIB::linkDown|IF-MIB::linkUp)(.|[[:space:]])*IF-MIB::ifIndex\.{#SNMPINDEX}"].str(linkDown)}=1 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:snmptrap["(IF-MIB::linkDown|IF-MIB::linkUp)(.|[[:space:]])*IF-MIB::ifIndex\.{#SNMPINDEX}"].nodata(2m)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE} changed state to DOWN

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:snmptrap["(IF-MIB::linkDown|IF-MIB::linkUp)(.|[[:space:]])*IF-MIB::ifIndex\.{#SNMPINDEX}"].str(linkUp)}=1 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:snmptrap["(IF-MIB::linkDown|IF-MIB::linkUp)(.|[[:space:]])*IF-MIB::ifIndex\.{#SNMPINDEX}"].nodata(2m)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE} changed state to UP

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifOperStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}=2 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifAdminStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Interface {#SNMPVALUE} Down
trigger_prototype.description: Where the Admin Status -- Desired -- equals 1 (Up) and the Operational Status -- actual -- equals 2 (Down), an interface that is supposed to be operational is not.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifInOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}/{Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>0.8 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>100000000
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Interface {#SNMPVALUE} Inbound Congestion 80%
trigger_prototype.description: Incoming traffic is greater than 80% bandwidth.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifInOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}/{Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>0.9 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>100000000
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Interface {#SNMPVALUE} Inbound Congestion 90%
trigger_prototype.description: Incoming Traffic is greater than 90% bandwidth.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifOutOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}/{Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>0.8 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>100000000
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Interface {#SNMPVALUE} Outbound Congestion 80%
trigger_prototype.description: Outgoing traffic is greater than 80% bandwidth.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifOutOctets[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}/{Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>0.9 and {Template SNMP Network Device Interfaces:ifSpeed[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>100000000
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Interface {#SNMPVALUE} Outbound Congestion 90%
trigger_prototype.description: Outgoing Traffic is greater than 90% bandwidth.

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} multicast degraded on {#SNMPVALUE}
